ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | negidd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | pncand.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_pncan | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( A + B ) - B ) = A ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) - B ) = A ) |
